aka: Ross Kemp: Na stopě gangů - Východní Timor
trans_title: 罗斯·坎普追寻黑帮·东帝汶
Ross Kemp: Na stopě gangů - Východní Timor
introduction: More than two-thirds of East Timorese youth are believed to be involved in gangs, ranging from martial arts groups to cult-like animist gangs. In the barrios of downtown Dili, Ross meets Sacred Heart and Seven Seven, two gangs in the midst of a deadly conflict, and witnesses their bizarre rituals, strict training and terrifying arsenal.
chinese_title: 罗斯·坎普追寻黑帮·东帝汶
